node.title: First batch of the Novavax COVID vaccine touches down in Australia
node.alt: People in high-vis shirts use machinery to unload two containers from a plane.
node.description: The first shipment of Novavax lands in Australia ahead of the rollout later this month.
node.content:
["The first shipment of the Novavax COVID\u00a0vaccine arrived in Australia last night ahead of the rollout later this month.", "The shipment of about 3 million doses landed in Sydney airport\u00a0from Singapore.", "The vaccine will\u00a0be supplied to GPs, pharmacies and state hubs across the country, and will be available from February 21.", "However federal Health Minister Greg Hunt says they first have to undergo batch testing by the Therapeutic Goods Administration.\u00a0", "\"Subject to successful batch testing, the Novavax vaccine will be available to be administered,\" he said.", "Australia has purchased 51 million doses of the Novavax vaccine, which is the fourth COVID vaccine available in Australia.", "It is\u00a0approved for people aged 18 and over, but at this stage does not have approval to be used as a booster.", "\"For some who may have had contraindications or reactions with regards to other vaccines, this will provide an additional opportunity for them, as well as those who for whatever reason have not taken up the program so far,\" Mr Hunt said.", "\"But I do want to encourage everyone, unless there's a contraindication, please continue to come forward and take the existing vaccines.\"", "The Novavax vaccine works in a different way to other vaccines that protect against infection or severe symptoms of COVID-19.", "The more common mRNA vaccines like Pfizer and Moderna contain a genetic instruction telling your body how to make a spike protein like that on the SARS-CoV-2 virus, so that your immune system learns to recognise and fight it.", "Novavax, on the other hand, delivers the spike protein itself into your body, and your immune system then learns to fight the virus in the same way.", "", "
The government plans to distribute Novavax by late February.(AP: Alastair Grant)
", "Novavax has not been as widely taken up around the world as other vaccines, but the Australian government has had an order for 51\u00a0million doses\u00a0in place for more than a year.", "Two separate worldwide trials found Novavax had a 90 per cent efficacy rate at preventing symptomatic infection with no major signals of adverse events.", "But those trials were conducted before the emergence of the Omicron variant. The company says it is conducting further studies on the efficacy of the vaccine against newer\u00a0variants.", "", "
Data shows many older Australians haven't had their booster
"]
